item.title: Superfast WordPress
item.description: Introduction WordPress is clearly one of the world’s most used Content Management Systems (CMS) commanding over 35% of the internet, and over 60% of the CMS market [1]. Working in Operations (ops), you see your fair share of friends, family and businesses that ask you to set up a WordPress site as their go to blogging platform. This really comes down to WordPress’ ease of use, massive library of themes and it’s modular nature that enables the extension of it’s core via the use of plugins.
